    Markdown for Technical Writing

    Using Markdown for Technical Writing

    less than 1 minute read

    Tralah M Brian

    Computer Scientist, Programmer, Writer, African. As our people say, a man who pays respect to the great paves way for his own greatness

    • Nairobi, Kenya, Africa

    Contents

    import numpy as np
v=np.ones(2)
M=np.matrix([np.ones(2),np.zeros(2)])
print(M*v.T)
